title: What's the best mask I can use for soldering? : r/AskElectronics - Reddit
body: The cheapest mask that can actually do anything runs about $35-$45: a NIOSH OV/P100, such as this. N95 masks won't do much. They might filter out most smoke particulates, but the vapor from the flux will still be there. A fume extractor is going to be far more affordable than this.
